attributes.action: Scrap the UCAT admission test for Medicine and Dentistry university applicants.
attributes.additional_details: We’d like to get rid of the UCAT system and replace with something more science or clinical based which represents the degree as doctors/dentists would not be operating in the way the UCAT exam requires us to do.
attributes.background: The UCAT is an unfair judgement and is not a true representation of someone’s ability within healthcare sector. This is because it is an unrealistically timed exam which has very little correlation to the degree.
